segments.text: Good morning . Sales Division . Alex speaking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alex . It ’ s Nancy over in Marketing . I ’ Ve got some good news for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh yeah ? I could use some . What ’ s up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr . Morris was so pleased with your sales work on his account that he went straight to the top with it . He wrote a letter about it to Mr . Macmillan !
segments.speaker: S2
